tomee_44e8d1e.message:
When configuring a queue or topic, use the id of the <Resource> tag as the destination name allowing for something like this:
  <Resource id="MyQueue" type"Queue"/>

Fixes: OPENEJB-706: NullPointerException initializing activemq

+ * limitations under the License.

+
+package org.apache.openejb.util;
+
+import org.junit.Test;
+
+import java.util.List;
+
+public class CollectionsUtilTest {
+
+    @Test
+    public void safeIterationForNullList()
+    {
+        List<String> stringList =null;
+        for(String string: CollectionsUtil.safe(stringList))
+        {
+        }
+
+        //PASS: No NPE thrown
+    }
+}

+import java.util.Collection;
+
+/**

+ */
+interface ActorLocalHome extends javax.ejb.EJBLocalHome {
+
+    Actor create(String firstName, String lastName) throws CreateException;
+
+    Actor findByPrimaryKey(Integer primarykey) throws FinderException;
+
+    Collection findAll() throws FinderException;
+}
